remarks: The function values of a mapping from the nonnegative integers with four distinct cases.  (Contributed by AV, 10-Nov-2019.)
statement:
fvmptnn04if.g $e |- G = ( n e. NN0 |-> if ( n = 0 , A , if ( n = S , C , if ( S < n , D , B ) ) ) ) $.
fvmptnn04if.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. NN ) $.
fvmptnn04if.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
fvmptnn04if.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
fvmptnn04if.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ N = 0 ) -> Y = [_ N / n ]_ A ) $.
fvmptnn04if.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ 0 < N /\ N < S ) -> Y = [_ N / n ]_ B ) $.
fvmptnn04if.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ N = S ) -> Y = [_ N / n ]_ C ) $.
fvmptnn04if.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ S < N ) -> Y = [_ N / n ]_ D ) $.
fvmptnn04if $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` N ) = Y ) $.
$d N n $.
$d S n $.
